instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:
input: "A Balsam Hill artificial Christmas tree brings all the holiday cheer of a live tree to your home without the hassle or messes that come with them. With our hinged branches and lightweight, collapsible stands, setup is simple. Your Christmas tree will be ready to decorate in no time! We also offer both prelit and unlit options, so you can choose whether you prefer the convenience of never having to set up lights, or keep the option to change what type of lights you use from year to year.Balsam Hill’s unparalleled artificial trees come in three levels of realism to suit different preferences and budgets:Our most realistic trees are from our exclusive True Needle collection. These are created branch by branch using molds of live branches to meticulously copy every detail of mother nature’s best Christmas trees in bi-colored polyurethane plastic.Our traditional artificial Christmas trees are made from durable PVC which is pressed into a thin paper-like material. Strips of this are expertly twisted into each wire branch, giving the tree a full and fluffy look that harkens back to the trees of Christmases past.Our realistic Christmas trees offer the perfect blend of the more realistic style and a full traditional look. These feature some of the same mold injected branches, but with additional PVC branches filling out the spaces between to give the tree a more robust silhouette.Balsam Hill® creates the most realistic artificial Christmas trees ever produced. Designed by Balsam Hill® exclusively for our customers, each Balsam Hill® Christmas tree is crafted for exceptional quality, beauty and convenience. All trees 9' and under in our Vermont Signature, Napa Christmas and Smoky Mountain Christmas Collections come with our 3-year limited warranty. We feature varied types of trees from pre-lit Christmas trees, to unlit Christmas trees and LED Christmas trees. You can also browse through our collections of multi-colour prelit Christmas trees and clear colour prelit Christmas trees."
output: {"translation": "Ein künstlicher Balsam Hill® Weihnachtsbaum beschert Ihnen die weihnachtliche Stimmung eines echten Baumes ohne den Aufwand und das lästige Nadeln. Dank der klappbaren Äste und des leichten, zerlegbaren Ständers gelingt der Aufbau mühelos. Ihr Weihnachtsbaum ist im Handumdrehen fertig zum Dekorieren. Wir bieten beleuchtete und unbeleuchtete Modelle, sodass Sie entscheiden können, ob sie es bequem machen und nie wieder Lichter an Ihren Baum anbringen müssen oder ob Sie sich die Option offen halte"}

instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:
input: "Christmas ribbons come in a range of different colours and fabric. This versatility makes Christmas tree ribbons an enticing option for home decoration. instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:
input: "Enjoy the splendour of nature in your home with lifelike artificial greenery that never wilt or dry. Make sure to preserve their beauty with proper care, which includes choosing the right garland and wreath storage.Cleaning Artificial Wreaths and GarlandsThe first step before storing your artificial wreaths and garlands is to clean them. While your faux foliage don’t need a lot of maintenance, keep them looking fresh and vibrant with these simple tips:•Regularly clean your artificial wreaths while on display to prevent build-up of dirt and dust.•Wipe your artificial foliage using a soft, dry cloth or fabric duster to remove any dirt. Avoid washing them with water, soap, or other cleaning agents as this may damage your décor and void the warranty.•For pre-lit wreaths and garlands, clean carefully with a soft-bristle paintbrush.Storing Artificial Wreaths and GarlandsMaintain the shape and appearance of your artificial greenery with proper garland and wreath storage. Here are tips to get you started:•Choose a storage location away from direct heat and sunlight. To prevent deformation and discolouration of faux foliage, keep wreath and garland storage bags in a cool, dry place like the closet, attic, or even under the bed. Another option is to use a Christmas wreath holder that you can hang over the door. •Invest in specially designed garland and wreath storage bags. Choose wreath and garland storage bags made with sturdy, durable material. You can also use airtight hard plastic containers to maintain the shape of your artificial foliage. As an alternative, store irregularly shaped or oversized items in large trash bags or cloth cover. •Allow enough space when packing. Don’t cram too many items into one container. Using separate bags or bins for each piece helps preserve their shape and prevent damage to attached baubles.Balsam Hill Wreath and Garland Storage Solutions Our Wreath Storage Bag keeps your artificial foliage looking new season after season. Padded for extra protection, our wreath storage bags feature an inner hanger and a carrying handle to allow storage in an upright position. You can also hang your wreath over the door with a Christmas wreath holder that provides additional support to your décor. Balsam Hill’s Rolling Multi-Purpose Greenery Bag is a versatile storage container that keeps several items in one place. Its spacious interior makes it a perfect garland storage bag that also accommodates a small Christmas tree and other foliage items. It has two heavy-duty wheels so it’s easy to move from place to place.The Multi-Purpose Storage Box is ideal for storing artificial garlands, swags, flower arrangements, and other decorations. It comes with a removable top drawer to organise small items like baubles, tree picks, and ribbons, and has handles and wheels for added convenience.Maintain the beauty of your artificial foliage for years to come with Balsam Hill’s premium garland and wreath storage bags. Browse our foliage hangers and storage solutions to conveniently store your greenery and other Christmas decorations. Contact our Customer Service Team for questions and concerns about Balsam Hill wreath and garland storage items. Sign up for our catalogue to find the perfect artificial Christmas tree, greenery, and décor for your home."

instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:
input: "Deck your hearth and home with the gorgeous new Christmas decorations. Balsam Hill offers its new arrivals of artificial Christmas trees, wreaths and garlands, and décor this season.New Artificial Christmas TreesFind the perfect Christmas centrepiece for your home from our selection of new artificial Christmas trees. Crafted with our exclusive True Needle™ foliage for exceptional realism, these new arrivals of artificial Christmas trees feature a variety of shapes and sizes that will fit any space. Traditional wide-profiled trees like the Noble Fir bring a classic touch to your display, while sparse by design European Fir is made with an organic silhouette and widely spaced branches specifically to showcase your favourite baubles. Designed for mobility and ease of set-up and storage, this collection of new trees also features trees designed with the signature Balsam Hill Flip Tree™ technology.New Wreaths and GarlandsComplement your Christmas tree with equally stunning greenery. Our new arrivals of wreaths and garlands features a variety of foliage types and sizes that suit your personal preferences. Offered both unlit and pre-lit with clear Candlelight™ LEDs, this new collection of Christmas foliage instantly adds warmth and cheer to any room. Dress up your mantel with the charming Mountain Chalet wreath and garland for a bountiful display. Bring a dash of sparkle and splash of colour to your front door or porches with gilded leaves and metallic baubles in red, green, and gold of our Deck the Halls decorated wreath and garland. Drape the exquisite Notting Hill Cypress garland with its UV-protected foliage that will last throughout the season over doorways and windows as you extend the celebration to the outdoors.New Christmas DecorationsGive your home the complete Christmas look with elegant decorations and accessories. Our new arrivals of décor include an extensive array of Christmas tree accents, scents, and storage solutions. Add shimmer and shine to your Christmas trees, wreaths, and garlands with glittered berry and floral tree picks. Luxurious Christmas tree skirts bring a luxurious finish to your tree, while our exclusive tree scents help set the ambience for your celebrations. After the festivities, easily put away your tree and decorations with our rolling tree stands and study storage bags. This collection offers everything you need for more magical and memorable moments this season.Take your Christmas display to the next level with the latest in festive décor and accessories. Browse the Balsam Hill website and shop new trees, foliage, and accents for your home today."

instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:

With its solid construction and easy storage, your tree will help bring holiday cheer back into your home season after season. And with the money you save on a stunning Balsam Hill tree, you can afford to deck your halls in a bit of extra Christmas magic with garlands, wreaths, bauble sets, and more!"

instruction: Please translate the following text from English to German:
input: "Bring a festive Christmas touch to every corner of your home with elegant potted Christmas trees and topiaries. Our artificial potted trees not only make beautiful additions to doorways, walkways, and porches, they also are elegant decorative accents for your tabletops and mantels.Festive FoliageCrafted with the same lifelike True Needle™ foliage, these artificial potted Christmas trees are miniature replicas of our premium full-sized Christmas trees. This collection features a variety of shapes and style that complement a wide range of decorating themes. From classic organic silhouettes to designer manicured shapes, these potted Christmas trees make the perfect backdrop to your festive gatherings. Expertly hand-strung energy-efficient LED lights bring added glow and sparkle to your celebrations this season.Stylish SelectionFill your home with Christmas charm and cheer as you decorate with beautiful potted Christmas trees. An all-time favourite, the Potted Baby Spruce boasts of an organic shape composed of long, upswept branches that remain beautiful whether decorated with your precious baubles or simply left bare. The Wimbledon Park Pine potted tree is set on an elegant decorative urn and provides a warm welcome to your guests with its highly realistic foliage and natural pinecone accents. Add shimmer and shine to your decorating with gilded leaves and glittered pinecones and berries of the dazzling Golden Pine potted tree. Accented with faux apples, berries, boxwood leaves, and twig balls, the enchanting Norway Spruce Holiday Potted tree makes the perfect addition to your kitchen nooks and tabletops. Create a wintry woodland look for your porch, patio, or entryways with the Mountain Meadow potted Christmas tree. This UV-protected potted tree is ideal for your outdoor gatherings and spaces with its unique blend of fir, eucalyptus, and cypress foliage. For a more modern and sophisticated look, our Boxwood Topiaries bring the flawless, manicured appeal of estate gardens to your home. This collection of potted trees features a double-ball, spiral, and finial potted tree that’s perfect for smaller rooms, entryways, and as elegant backdrop to your al fresco dining.Deck the halls with stunning artificial potted Christmas trees and make your celebrations more memorable. Browse the Balsam Hill website and shop exclusive Christmas decorations for your home today."
